website_summaries.verdict: A long-life, bright white LED bulb that improves near-field visibility at high-beam and low-beam settings.
pros: Brighter high and low beams that improve visibility, with no trace of blue hue
Very easy to install in most cars
Smaller power draw means output is always steady
cons: Better at illuminating area close to the vehicle than at a distance
Longer bulb housing may make for tricky installation

website_summaries.verdict: Basic LED conversion light kit that works well with older vehicles lacking advanced computer systems.
pros: Shines at a bright 6,000 lumens with a white hue
Clear and bright for bad weather and night use
cons: Light bulbs are susceptible to noise and radio interference, causing flickering

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far! Pretty tricky to install in a 2006 (8th gen) Honda Civic, but definitely doable! I will update this review once I do some night time driving. Edit: After a couple night drives, I must say I'm very satisfied. The bulbs are brighter than what was originally in the car, but not overly bright. The beam pattern seems pretty spot on too. Advice: If you want these bulbs to fit perfectly in an 8th gen Civic, you need to use the O rings from your previous bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: agentg1001

customer_reviews.title: 2011 nissan titan
customer_reviews.text: I bought the whole set for my truck and they look way better than stock. The pictures don't do it justice. If you have a nissan titan id recommend partially taking the tire well and putting them in through there, instead of taking the whole front grill off. 1st picture is lowbeams old 2nd picture is highbeams old 3rd picture is lowbeams new 4th picture is highbeams new Yes I copied and pasted the same review from the 9005 model.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First I want say that I ordered these lights on Saturday afternoon and received them Monday afternoon!!!!!! That in itself is awesome but even better than that is the quality of these lights. They are by far the best bulbs I have ever had in a vehicle. These bulbs are definitely worth the money. I replaced all of my front light bulbs with the 9006 as my low beams and fog lights,and 9005 as my high beams(2004 4runner) . The 6k color is perfect as well. Thank you for such a well built amazing product. I sell people on these bulbs everytime headlight conversations come up.
customer_reviews.author: david henry

customer_reviews.title: Best bulbs for the money. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are some of the best LED headlight bulbs you can purchase. Naturally I was skeptical of the quality because of the low price, but I have to say they don't blind other drivers but they gave me a lot more light than the standard bulbs did. Took less than 3 minutes to install both of them in my 2004 Chevrolet Silverado. I'll follow up in 90 days to see how well they last.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fit well, build quality seems solid
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 1995 LeSabre fine. Much brighter, and the "aiming" for these headlights (not the bulbs, but the headlight housing) is kind of tough, so I'll have to work on that. I've only got them installed in a car in my pole barn, and the car isn't driveable at then moment, so I hooked up a jump pack and that let me check the lights. That being said, I have tested it on the road, or outside, but inside that dark building, you could definitely tell the difference. The harness on lights is sort of short, so using the provided double-sided tape to mount the adapter is kind of tough, but you could always use the zip ties instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2005 Toyota Highlander as low beams. Fit perfectly in place of the incandescent bulbs. Wire leads long enough to make connecting the wiring very easy. Very bright. Much brighter and longer projection than the Sylvania Silver Star Ultra bulbs that were in the car. After a few weeks, one of the bulbs started to barely flicker when the vehicle and lights were off. I contacted SeaLight and they quickly sent a replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: Highmaster2

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t quite fit
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that these didn’t fit as they should. They slid into the electrical connectors, but no matter how I tried, they wouldn’t click into the clip that locks them in. I ended up returning these and going with regular sylvania bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: weldrwomn

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much that I bought the high beams too. They were easy to install on my 2005 Honda Odyssey...I had them on 15 minutes after they arrived in the mail! They really give me much better vision at night than the old incandescent bulbs did. I can't wait to get the hi beams on now! I'll be highly recommending these in my Honda Odyssey Odyssey group on Facebook!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia K

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: For now i have installed the 9006 low beam and the 9005 high beams in my car (96 accord) my low beam stays on when i turn on high beams it gives me 9000 lumens of light. It is super bright. Medium size colored street signs change the interior of my car to what ever color the sign is lol. So far amazing products and still bright as day one
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Sealight x1 9006 headlights
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright, but the beam pattern os weird. Is there a way to adjust the baseplate? Because my led chips face up and down instead of side to side when installed. Other than that it looks great. (Update 2/12/2019) After having these headlights on for a couple months i can honestly say the lights are not what i expected. First off, the lights shine at a slanted angle. 2nd the lights look bright up close, but when driving at night you can barely tell if the lights are on. Unless the lights i have are defective, i would not recommend this..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it lasts for 2 years, I'll be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed this item on my 2004 Toyota Corolla and after adjusting the headlight to the proper height, I could not be more pleased!! I did some experimentation comparing the amount of light output with one headlight having the Sealight LED bulb and installing three (3) different halogen replacement bulbs that were supposed to be brighter than the stock bulbs, the Sealight was better in brightness and coverage without question. I now have the visibility that is equal to my 2015 Toyota Corolla with factory LED headlamps!! If these bulbs last at least two (2) years, I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: George S. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install just plug and play you can't go wrong buying these.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good installation was easy on a 2014 Honda Civic LX and they look good will update tonight when I check them out and add pics. Update waited till it got dark out these things are very bright but I love that they focus the lights like normal so you are not blinding people these lights are amazing at an even more amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company sent me out an “upgraded” set with the fan in the rear. Hard to tell a difference between the good old bulb and the new bulb brightness. Will test the longevity however. Have to give great kudos for excellent customer service! The light I installed on the drivers side has weakened compared to the passenger side.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: 2013Honda Civic
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to install. I was almost thinking I got the wrong ones. I plugged them in first to see if power was even getting to it and it did. It was just installing into the socket that was tricky. But with some patience and the right angle I got them secured in. They look great and I’ll have to wait until the evening to see how they really do. Always remember to adjust the headlights so you are not one of those annoying people on the road with LED headlights blinding on coming traffic. Adjust accordingly. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Great headlights
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights! put them in my 08 Corolla and they work great! Nice and bright without being blinding! Took my 2 tries to get them aligned to not blind oncoming traffic.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright, but..
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it had already been opened so i figured it would give me trouble. It is not designed to fit this car and probably many others that they claim it does. For my car it will fit in the slots but will not go all the way in because it is too long for my headlights design. Thinking it was all the way in I turned it and it tore the tiny single screw holding the base together out of the aluminum threads. I was able to fix it and also modify my headlight so they would work, and they do look nice and bright, but they need more honest advertising. Car: 2001 Corolla
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good but Radio interference
customer_reviews.text: Been looking to upgrade my headlights from xenon. Ideally I wanted HIDs but didnt want to spend that much money & wasnt sure if id get the same beam pattern. Got these because they are about the same cost as xenon & love the brightness. Just realized though that they are causing FM radio interference when on. No big deal since I have a short work commute & have amazon music to listen to on long trips.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler V.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Have a set in my Silverado and Tahoe. I work early in the morning so when I leave for the day its always dark and highway driving. These provide nice clear vision and illumination, well worth the cost and the quality has been good for me on both vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Too high color temp.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the color temperature. It was a pain to install, I did get it but I had to work for it. My friends suggested that I remove them, my low beams are now brighter than the high beam now. But its the color temp that everyone dislikes.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with these leds, they are bright and seem to last. I have had them over a year and still working great. I did have an issue with thwm fitting really tight and got ahold of customer service. They were able to help me and managed to fix the problem. Great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: but so far I'm happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just installed today on my 2010 Accord. Very bright and white compared to the old incandescent bulbs. I struggled mightily with the first bulb. Finally realized the rubber gasket on the LEDs was just slightly larger than the bulbs I took out. Swapped out (just rolls right off) the gaskets with the ones from the old bulbs and they fit perfectly. I will update down the road if needed, but so far I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nmill005

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I initially had a problem with the product not working, but I worked with supplier's Customer Service Representative Cathy to resolve the problem and was shipped a replacement. Upon receipt I easily installed the light bulb assemblies and both headlights work great. These bulbs are much brighter than my previous halogin bulbs which is good for visual safety when driving.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for diodes to not face correctly even if it says fits vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Love the brightness an the 9006, bought the 9005 and realizing the diodes doesnt line up right. After 4 days speaking to customer service i feel like they do their best to avoid replacing or return, keep telling the people they are inserted right and that the diodes arent facing right and they keep saying is it plugged in correct? Well theres only one way... ignorant services. Wished they'd replace them with ones that can be least adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: o far so good. Just installed today
customer_reviews.text: They lasted for a little over a month. Now they don’t work. What the...and I passed a window. 1 month warranty. Are you kidding me!!! What a rip off. The one light went out today. Now what. I have to order again. These need to be replaced!So far so good. Just installed today. Chevy Silverado 2007 classic. Needed to cut the plastic behind the light in order for it to fit but now is perfectly in there. Will see how long they last. Before and after ahot
customer_reviews.author: NIck

customer_reviews.title: Bright as HID lamps in luxury vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: They're as easy to change in my '07 Silverado Classic as any I have ever changed. They're nice and bright and make things so much more clear, but they remind me that I need to do a lens treatment on my headlights. I am hopeful that they will last and I don't run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Starling Bissette

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This kit took about 45 minutes to install on both headlights, which included the YouTube research on my particular vehicle. They look and work great! I was pleasantly surprised that the light was the natural LED white, and not that weird blueish white. Excellent product and price!
customer_reviews.author: Teall Haycock

customer_reviews.title: These lights are affordable and bright.
customer_reviews.text: The install for these bulbs we're plug and play. Very simple install. I also have the fog light LEDs in my truck from the same company. Both the headlight LEDs and fog light LEDs are bright on their own, and when you have them both, you wonder how you drove with standard bulbs for so long. These bulbs are so bright and make driving at night easy. The pictures were taken at 10:30 at night. It almost looks like it's day time
customer_reviews.author: Brandon McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Good price, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: 2008 honda civic. Can be installed without to much destruction if you are patient and have nimble hands. Drivers side no disassembly, passengers side remove the windshield washer filler.Good price, perfect fit, it's like the lines on the road are reflective. Simply amazing. Especially good during rain at night. Will never go back to standard replacements.
customer_reviews.author: MR. CLEAN

customer_reviews.title: Sealight X1 fanless design 9006
customer_reviews.text: One light nice and white, one light super blue in color. The halogen light i had prob had a better lighting display and functionality. It was a terrible experience trying to install one of the bulbs the pins Were wide and thick to be able to twist into the 9006 socket on my factory headlights. After almost an hour finally got it to work and was disappointed in the quality of the lights. I have used diffrent brand led’s for low beam use in the past and always had a nice experience. Not the case with these maybe i got my self a bad set of lights however not sticking around to find out otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Lights turn off at random times!!!
customer_reviews.text: The lights turned on and off multiple times while driving even while the car was still. The lights were installed exactly like the video showed. All parts were tight and nothing was loose. I’m returning this product. I gave their product a shot and it was a huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Headlights!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first LED headlights that I've bought and installed on one of my cars and I love them. They are really easy to install and shine great. They aren't the brightest LED lights I've seen but for me they are perfect because I dont want my eyes to hurt while I drive at night. They have defenitely given me better visibility on the road. Theres nothing to complain about these led headlights. I have a 1995 Honda Accord Ex and the led headlights were easy to install and did not create an error code on my car. Well done Sealight!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and returned them
customer_reviews.text: Received these and tried to install them. I first plugged the bulbs in to make sure they worked. Neither build worked straight out of the box. After looking even though the description said they would fit my vehicle, the bulbs would not even fit into my headlight assembly. Very disappointed and returned them. Won't buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Willard Burdine

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome, super bright and they make it so easy to change from the old bulbs to these LEDs when you have a somewhat older model car. One of mine burnt out within a year and their customer service was outstanding; they sent me a new set overnight once we had everything figured out. Will definitely be buying again. I’ve already purchased their S1 model for my ‘04 explorer.
customer_reviews.author: Max McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation Super bright So far reliable Great value Great price Installed on 2010 Honda civic EX and makes a world of a difference especially at night driving! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ESPEC

customer_reviews.title: This works so much better than my stock ones
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than my stock ones. I can actually see the road and all the animals crossing the street at night. The only problem I had was getting them to fit into my halo housing. It took awhile to finally get them in. So hopefully they stay secure and last longer than the stock bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: FireballMushRoomTail

customer_reviews.title: My wife was beginning to have trouble driving at night ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife was beginning to have trouble driving at night with our 2006 Honda Odyssey because the original halogen lights were so dim. Took less than 15 min to install these and WOW, what a difference! Seems 3X-4X brighter, and much safer for her. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A.S., Houston, TX

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old and still working great.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these over a year ago and they are still working great. Absolutely no problems. Once I installed them I only had to adjust them down a little. The light was a little high and blinding other drivers. Nice clean white light. Makes my 2001 Toyota Camry look new coming down the street at night.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are really nice, lighting up the streets very nicely at night. I can't compare to other LED bulbs, but these are certainly better than the stock bulbs that came with my car.
customer_reviews.author: darkridr

customer_reviews.title: Proper horizontal beam cutoff
customer_reviews.text: These were the only bulbs that had the proper horizontal beam cutoff for my 2007 Honda Accord. I tried other brands on Amazon and this one works best. With the proper beam cutoff, your headlights do not blind oncoming drivers. Also brightness is just a little brighter than oem and color temperature is right in the middle of white.
customer_reviews.author: Nghia D. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Really brite, nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love the improvements in lumens and color. My original headlights looked normal to me for years. However, once I replaced the old bulbs with these... instant huge difference! Really impressed, I went from really dull yellowish lit roads to a awesome brite white lit road. Do Not forget to pull up to your garage door at dark and adjust the headlight level on both headlights. Mine required a simple hex allen wrench and a few turns each. Don't over adjust then too high or you will bling oncoming traffic, and possibly a traffic ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: A great upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: It is really a Plug-n-play installation for my '06 Toyota highlander limited. I purchased the high and the low beam bulbs installed and they've worked great for months now. I didn't measure, compare if they are really a thousand times brighter than original headlight, but it is REALLY bright and gives me a clear view of the road. I feel the price is fair for the quality and the customer support is awesome, I feel confident with Sealight's products after this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: Good lights for the price
customer_reviews.text: lights said DOT approved online and they are and they will send you the paperwork if needed. you can’t adjust them like some others these don’t have a set screw to spin them to adjust. These lights do work good but just not a focusable as some of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed on week 3
customer_reviews.text: I installed the 2 lights I bought with ease. They are bright and was looking forward of having more than 3 weeks of use. One of the lights went out. I will choose another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: WeebeeGB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Seem good at first use. We will see how they hold up. I feel that the brightness is really good but not as bright as other LEDs I see on the road. Decent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harms

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade in lighting
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2009 Honda Civic Sedan perfectly. Great cheap upgrade! I can actually see at night now compared to the factory halogens. Took me about 15 mins to install after watching a few videos online. Hope they will last.
customer_reviews.author: H. tran

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. These lights are well built and better than the factory, but the brightness is not near what I'd hoped for. I guess they can't be too bright due to oncoming traffic. They are beginning to cause flutter to my radio which goes away after 5-7 seconds. The radio's reception is not as clear as it was.

customer_reviews.title: Bright Lights!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my 2008 Honda Civic. What an upgrade to the oem lights. They are difficult to install on a Honda (design flaw of Honda). So far I’m happy with them. I’ll update if I experience any flickering or other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy retrofit into standard automotive headlight assemblies. Brilliantly bright! An absolute must have for those who desire greater visibility than that of halogen bulbs. Highly recommended purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I wrote the company and they sent me a video of the bulbs locking in place. But no matter how hard I push the bulb wire into the connector on my car they don't lock together. I have to use tape to hold the two together.
customer_reviews.author: TLD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the reliability and brightness. Easy to install as well. Have been using the product for more than 2 years. Still works great
customer_reviews.author: Mohit

customer_reviews.title: 1st set had bad wire, 2nd set works just fine BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: 1 set if lights I purchased the left head light wire was bad. The right side head light worked just fine. Bright. Can see better now when driving. I got a replacement over night. Very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: High value, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs. Easy install in 03 Silverado, perfect pattern, no radio noise. Pictures show one halogen with one Sealight, then both Sealights. Big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Cougar

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Would not fit in car that it was advertised to fit into. We repeatedly tried to contact support via phone and email and had issues with both.
customer_reviews.author: Robint

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and works well
customer_reviews.text: This fit in my 2006 Pontiac Grand Prix GXP. Other bulbs were too long (there's a metal panel behind the headlights that prevented other LEDs from fitting as they are too deep). Light output is great. Installation was plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: GHLKAL

customer_reviews.title: Good performance but short life.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the performance and ease of installation however after only 8 months one of the headlights failed
customer_reviews.author: Camry Man

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 2000 toyota avalon and the lights do not work... Did extensive troubleshooting to no avail
customer_reviews.author: denyveau eloit

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: This work perfectly and look great. Truly plug and play. Very bright without being blinding. I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Finally led headlight bulbs I can use!!
customer_reviews.text: lights fit perfectly. Snug fit so they won't come loose. Installed them in my 2003 Chevy Silverado. Usually had a problem with the fan of an led bulb hitting the frame not allowing me to install the headlights back in but with these no hassle at all. my personal preference to have a bit brighter but can't complain over all
customer_reviews.author: angel alonzo

customer_reviews.title: whitelight
customer_reviews.text: these a great now my 2003 trailblazer has lights like my new car great value much better than my silverstar ultra bulbs
customer_reviews.author: mauricette

customer_reviews.title: 2004 Toyota Highlander
customer_reviews.text: 2004 Toyota Highlander, installed these. It didn't work initially, but just read that I had to flip the part that connects to the outlet. Now it matches + to + and - to -. Can't wait to test it tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Benjie

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Compared to 2015 stock lights. I'm very happy with them. Hopefully they are not blinding to other drivers because I hate when cars have blinding lights. Thank you! Installed in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Salas

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. The middle of the light sucket was ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The middle of the light sucket was spinning all the time on both lights. I couldn’t tight the lights to the headlight assembly for that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Good - white lights. Easy money.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on longevity- used twice. Nice and even white light with out dark spots on the street ( 2005 Silverado). Would recommend and will probably look for some for my driving lights.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing compared to Halogen stock
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2005 Dodge Magnum and they were an amazing upgrade and no crazy output glare.
customer_reviews.author: T. Luggiero

customer_reviews.title: Headlight Bulb
customer_reviews.text: Had to remove back off of headlight to get bulb in between bracket and headlight.
customer_reviews.author: ABE

customer_reviews.title: Drivability Brightness
customer_reviews.text: I installed these plus the high beam version as well (9005) in my 2005 silverado with ease. No modifying at all. fit perfectly and did it in the evening time so after installing I went for a drive to see how they did and oh my how much of a difference it was and didn't have oncoming passengers giving me the high beams lol.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great view with these being used as fog light bulbs. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: busted nut cycles

customer_reviews.title: Expect to return
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but they do have faults resulting in constant replacement. Average bulb life is unknown as the failing part is the inverter unit.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Obvious

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good, I have them more than 8 months ago and I am very happy, now I go to you a lot of Light in my truck, when you install it you must regulate them and lower them because they are very strong and high lights, very good
customer_reviews.author: Arian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the Led lights over the factory i put these in everything i drive
customer_reviews.author: Chevelle1970

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had them on for about 8 months now and they still work great! Easy to install (plug and play) and super bright !
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gaudette

customer_reviews.title: Red rubber ring was too big
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it yesterday, would have been easy if the red rubber ring was the right size. They were too big, so I used the rubber ring from the old light bulb. It was an upgrade for my 2012 Honda Civic. Hopefully lasted like advertised. I will update if it is dead faster than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: David Kurniawan

customer_reviews.title: Work great so far
customer_reviews.text: I installed these a few weeks ago and they are working very well so far. Installation was no more difficult than installing regular halogen headlight bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Santucci

customer_reviews.title: VERY BRIGHT... FANTASTIC AT NIGHT and RAINY DAYS...
customer_reviews.text: Very EASY to INSTALL ... During USE I can see BETTER and WIDER along the road... Definitely an UPGRADE in my car 2005 Honda Civic LX... Hoping it will at least last for 3 years or more....
customer_reviews.author: Marie Oliveros

customer_reviews.title: Not all that Brigh
customer_reviews.text: I have had much better they are ok might move them to the fog light. I wouldn't buy again but they get the job done I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Big Meech

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade to these.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful product. Made a huge difference in the quality of my headlights coming from the factory lights. It was an easy install, and included some zip ties to secure the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Varnell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright easy to install but the rubber piece in back covering wire will not stay on.but good
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2003 Chevy Silverado assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great product for LED light for 9006 High Beam, fit my 2003 Chevy Silverado unlike some other ones that are not mini or 1:1 size.
customer_reviews.author: Oather T. Belcher

customer_reviews.title: 2005 expedition, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Good lighting. 2005 expedition. No mods needed at all, but have to remove entire headlight assembly to change headlight bulbs. The bulb is a tad tricky to get in, having to push and twist pretty hard. Hope they hold up, it's nice being able to see!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: they light up a lot excellent lights I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Ludwing Castillo

customer_reviews.title: No flickering, but causes radio interference
customer_reviews.text: These lights fixed the strobe and flickering effects we were seeing on explorer, but they do interfere with the radio pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lights.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bulbs so far. They are simple plug and go replacements for halogen. Much brighter, and the color tone increases visibility for me. I will edit my review if I experience any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product fits my 03 Camry , plug and play ! Bright ,
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are as described. Very bright relatively easy to install. The only problem I had was one of them broke. Customer service had quick and easy way to contact them and they sent me a replacement quickly. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: applesan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our 2005 Honda Accord. Extremely bright too!
customer_reviews.author: CA22

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sceptical at first but great lights out them on my 2003 4runner sr5
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: They are super easy to install. Super Bright!
customer_reviews.text: These headlights are amazing. I was happy that i didn’t have to buy a separate kit to make LED headlights work in my car. They are so bright people think I’m driving with my brights on.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are super bright and works really well
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are super bright and works really well. Only thing I got is that you have to make sure you have a really small Allen key to adjust the bulbs to make them point to the sides. The set screw is located under the o-ring, just remove the o-ring loosen the set screw and adjust your bulbs so when it’s installed the leds point to the sides.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: They are really bright
customer_reviews.text: Installed this led bulbs on my 2001 Silverado LT low beam they are brighter than the HUD I had before , I’m satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Ray 566

customer_reviews.title: Reversal did not seem like a good idea with the plug configured as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, would not work in my car. The plugs are polarized with a locking tab. Reversal did not seem like a good idea with the plug configured as it is.
customer_reviews.author: . Russell

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The brightness is perfect but the fitting was very poor. Doesn’t now exactly fit into the slot

customer_reviews.title: Cheap brand!
customer_reviews.text: I if I could give 0 star I would after one week stop working!

customer_reviews.title: The 14 month bulb
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs on the last 14 months for both of my trucks how ironic is that. Also when the bulbs on I feel like I'm on the airplane on the runway taking off
customer_reviews.author: anton kalaj

customer_reviews.title: Led Lights work great
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my 2009 Toyota Rav4. The wiring was perfect. The Led fit very tight in the socket so becareful installing it
customer_reviews.author: michael a thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love the 9006 so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install work great so far. It's only been about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Good LED's for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price they was a little difficult to get them to fit on my 2001 chevy silverado but after wrestling them in there got them on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I dont believe these to be street legal. DOT certified maybe?
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be made durably but dont put out enough light. If you are shining them on say a garage door close up they are brighter, but real road use they do not compare to standard halogens. Wanted a refund but accidently waited past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Much better than original equipment
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 18 year old grandson to see better on older 2004 car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ting of blue that I have come to love in leds.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks wonderful. Bright even in the fog. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: M L D Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I can see Clearly now
customer_reviews.text: Great lights that make it easy to see down the road and for the deer running out of the ditches. Very affordable and well worth getting. I now have converted all of my vehicles over to LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

product_meta.title: SEALIGHT 9006/HB4 LED Headlight Bulbs X1 Series 12 CSP Chips 6000LM 6000K Xenon White Non-polarity
product_meta.description:
Notice

1. Please notice the locking taps should installed on the right side, if you can’t install the bulbs, please switch the locking taps around and make them fit

2. Please notice the LED chips should facing left-right but instead of top and bottom

3. If the plug in prongs can’t plug with the connector, please adjust the prongs with scissors or other tools

4. Some cars, such as some sensitive car requires the decoder (warning canceller) to be installed together to avoid the flicker and warning

Please check with us if your car requires CANBUS before purchasing

5. If your DRL shares the same bulb with headlights, it may be too powerful to light up in DRL mode. The DRL may be flickering

Item specification

1. Power: 40W, 20W per bulb

2. Voltage: 12V

3. LED type: latest 12 CSP chips per pair

4. Color Temperature: 6000K xenon white

5. Lumen: 6000 lumen, 3000LM per lamp

6. IP67-rated

7. Shell Material: aluminum alloy

8. Placement on Vehicle: front

9. Installation: plug and play

Package included

1 Pair led headlight

4 Zip ties

2 Double sided tape
feature_bullets: Better visibility: SEALIGHT 9006 LED headlight bulbs combo kit have better visibility, high beam have brighter output, low beam have better beam pattern, replace your yellow or dim stock bulb. Warm tip: we are upgrading our packaging and you may receive one of two boxes randomly
Enhanced beam pattern: although brighter than standard halogen bulbs, the light is focused down road so oncoming traffic will not be blinded, and there are no dark spots or shadow areas
See more clearly: ditch your dim yellow halogen bulbs and make way for super-focused bright 6000K LED headlights. The daylight optics give superior visibility, as well as giving your car added style
Compact fanless design: the latest non-integrated fanless design is compact and silent, utilizes an advanced heat sink measuring just 0.72 inches, and features a driver for increased performance
Extended lifespan: the X1 LED headlight bulb has been rigorously tested for durability and boasts an incredible extended lifespan of over 50,000 hours for longer-lasting illumination

specifications.Special Features: Lower Profile, Better Beam Pattern, IP67, Plug and Play, Superior CSP LED chips
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars952 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
